channel.title: Creative, Critical, Courageous on CCTMC
channel.description: Recent content in Creative, Critical, Courageous on CCTMC

item.title: 2019 Spring Outing
item.description:
Last Saturday, CCTMCers went outing at the Olympic Forest Park. We had a great time burning calories and taking snapshots despite the cold and mizzly weather Warm up session
Walking race session     Participants were devided into three teams: Red, Blue and Yellow. Let’s do some warming-up together! Rules of the Game     1. Both roaming and jogging are ok; each team’s result is based on the last-arriving member’s record;

item.title: About
item.description: CCTMC is one of the best Toastmasters clubs in Beijing. If you want to join out club, please reach us at: Phone: 18800000000 Email: awesome@cctmc.com Our avenue:

item.title: Officers
item.description: Hana: President Heather: IPP BingJie: VPM Cathy: VPPR Smile: VPE Jessie: VPPR Wenjie: Scheduler Amber: Treasurer CiCi: Secretary Stephy: Secretary Gina: VPPR assistant Rita: VPPR assistant Alim: SAA
